Name: Extreme Peg Solitaire
About the game: Extreme Peg Solitaire is a minimalist game designed for Peg Solitaire and puzzle lovers. Features Play through 60 hand designed puzzles. Play with different unique pegs. Collect stars to master the game Enjoy the classic mode and play the regular Peg Solitaire. Choose the background sound for your puzzle. Play with the mouse, keyboard or gamepad. Jump over another ghost. Only one ghost can survive. Melee attack. Directly strike on a melee ghost. Jump Backstab. Directly attack a two space ghost. Diagonal Arrow. Jump diagonally over a ghost. Magical Jump Diagonally attack a two space ghost . Thank you for showing interest on Extreme Peg Solitaire, how about giving it a try?
